name: logsure-field-service
description: Professional field service task management integration for Claude Desktop
long_description:
Connect Claude Desktop to your LogSure field service management system. View daily tasks, check completion status, and manage locations - all through natural conversation with Claude. Perfect for field service teams, facility managers, and maintenance professionals who want AI-powered task management.

**Features:**
- View today's scheduled tasks with location details
- Check task status and filter by completion state
- Browse organization locations and hierarchies
- Secure authentication via your LogSure account

**Security:** All data stays within your LogSure organization. Authentication uses your existing Clerk tokens with Firebase security.
